thread.title: William Leonhardt
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by William Leonhardt

author: William Leonhardt
title: William Leonhardt
text: O.T.R. was the best choice I could have made to help resolve my tax liability situation. They provided excellent service at every step of my case and guided me through each phase towards a resolution. I am now going through the program that has been accepted to resolve my case and I am very satisfied with the outcome.
